starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.controller

Class AbstractPlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.controller.AbstractPlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayerController, HumanPlayerController

    public abstract class AbstractPlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameController
    Class that contains methods that are relevant/used for both Computer and Human player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPlayerController

        public AbstractPlayerController(GameStateData gameState,
                                Player player,
                                GameOptions options)
        Creates a new AbstractPlayerController to be used by both human and computer players.
        Parameters:
        gameState - a GameStateData which we'll use to retrieve information about the server/game phase.
        player - a Player model to control.
        options - GameOptions which are used to store username/password credentials/available regions for play.

      • discardDraw

        public boolean discardDraw(PolicyCard[] policyCards)
        Checks to see if an array of cards is eligible to be discarded and drawn this turn.
        Parameters:
        policyCards -
        Returns:
        true if there is an action to use and there are no more than 3 cards to discard/draw.

      • discard

        public boolean discard(PolicyCard policyCard)
        Discards a card this turn. DOES NOT draw immediately.
        Parameters:
        policyCard - a PolicyCard to discard.
        Returns:
        true if there is a discard action to use.

      • voteYes

        public void voteYes(PolicyCard policyCard)
        Submits a yes vote for the passed PolicyCard to the server, as well as updating the player's Ballot accordingly.
        Parameters:
        policyCard - a PolicyCard to vote yes on.

      • voteNo

        public void voteNo(PolicyCard policyCard)
